data.text: @EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU What if there's a USB-D in like five or ten years, that's way better than USB-C, and you're going to take an additional five to ten years to change the directive? That's what I'm afraid of.

@EU_Commission Honestly I've been looking forward to this for quite a while. One cable to rule them all. If apple does put USB-C, that means I can charge my Dell XPS, Samsung S21+ and iPhone Pro Max with the same charger. And hopefully finally USB 3.1 speeds for iPhones as well.
@EU_Commission Thanks mate your are pure gold , the best govering body in the world.
@EU_Commission we really need that!
@EU_Commission Your organisation is a complete fail.

@EU_Commission This is total BS and stupidity on a new level! You can’t just force companies to do what you want when example Apple’s lightning cable works just fine. Let the companies do their job! Overregulation is a dangerous thing.

@EU_Commission This will styme innovation. USB Type-C is far from a perfect connector. Pogo pin charging devices much more durable. Don't hide behind this e-waste excuse. I am sure there are more lighting cables in the EU. You are making MORE e-waste.
@EU_Commission Such a stupid, communist idea!!! You are killing competition. Is that your idea of quality????

@EU_Commission Why yes they are, unfortunately I am a United States Citizen and thus I have to wait for my country to unfuck itself in a variety of ways before we even begin to draft legislation on this.
@EU_Commission What part of the U from USB don't you understand?

@EU_Commission Yes please! I am in favor of this.

It won't limit technology because if some company decides to make a new port, the phone can just have two ports.
@EU_Commission Fuck Apple ahaha
@EU_Commission About time, hopefully all smart speakers will have usb C aswell.

@EU_Commission @vestager @EU_Commission The idea to regulate standardized adapters for smartphone/, tablets is per se not bad. But how does the EU know which protocols and adapters will come in future. This is a massive bad interference in any future innovation. STOP IT!
@EU_Commission It would be a great win for people and the planet. We hope @Apple accepts this.
@EU_Commission In principle I can see the logic, but you’re telling private companies how to design their products - it’s wrong on so many levels.

@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Also putting an end to competition and improvements! We're already down to only 3 connectors. Forcing everyone to use one means there's no point in doing research and development on a better connector you won't get to use.

@EU_Commission That will not reduce electronic waste because people will buy a cable for each device, throwing the old cables away, which will double the waste. 

This proposition doesn't make sense and it will create more waste.
@EU_Commission Introduce a universal phone battery, with contacts that can't be moved on each phone model. Then outlaw integrated batteries.
@EU_Commission Well done guys!
@EU_Commission Awesome!
@EU_Commission Hmmm how will apple respond to this

@EU_Commission I don't understand why Apple is so stubborn to switch to the standard. They use USB C as the primary port on all their computers now, but complain that putting it on their phone would somehow stifle innovation. A cable that can connect any device to any other is innovative af!

@EU_Commission Let’s pull the plug on the #EU !!!

#NeXit
@EU_Commission Good decision!

@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr Yes, but please do it FAST (an unknown term within the #EUCO) before Apple goes ahead and creates a portless device. 

You should have implemented this last year already.

@EU_Commission Too bad big brands (both Samsung and Apple since last year) make you pay the same price for a device that now doesn't include a charger so you have to put "x" money on top of your purchase to buy what they should have included in the sale already, try to regulate this before.
@EU_Commission I love this and can only hope that @Apple doesn't get in the way

@EU_Commission Imagining the European Union doing useful things for the people living on this earth. But no. The EU has other things to do than important problems like hunger, climate change and so much I couldn't stop.
But CABLES are the important problems we have in this earth!

@EU_Commission Since I don't own a single Apple products I see no harm in this, but I can already hear the screams of agony from Apple HQ and Apple products owners if this ever becomes real. But I believe it's necessary to make things easier in the future.

@EU_Commission Forcing a company on how to design their device? Definition of innovation stifling by government. What if in 10 years someone makes a port that’s 200 times faster and smaller that type C? Oh can’t use it cause Europe said no. 

This is balderdash and popycock.
@EU_Commission Great job 👍
@EU_Commission Even as an iPhone user myself, I'm glad Apple will be forced to get rid of the crappy Lightning port. USB C is definitely the future.
@EU_Commission When will we know if the proposal was accepted?

@EU_Commission
#BanFactoryFarming
The #meatindustry is by far the biggest #animalkiller in the #world
It is also responsible for the relentless cruelty 
that #pigs #sheep #cows #chickens #ducks, #geese and other #animals #suffer every minute of their short #lives

@EU_Commission How long has this been dragging on in the EUrocracy? A common interface is good, but every phone is bundled with a charger plug, a lead, and a set of earbuds. THIS is where the waste occurs. Also in apps forcing phone upgrades because they can't run on older phones.

@EU_Commission Youll increase waste massively. I have 8 cables all would need to be binned & replaced

Far better to ban sale of all phones & small electrical items with any type of charger or cable AND force all chargers to use one of say 2 or 3 output voltages / plugs. I’ve 25+ spare chargers
@EU_Commission One charger to charge them all 🤗
@EU_Commission @ECDC_EU @EU_Health První zoranžověl @KrajMsk

@EU_Commission The EU. They were elected by nobody but themselves. If I say I don’t agree they will override whatever I have to say they will listen to a small girl from a small country and say that her autistic mind is far superior to mine and therefore we must listen to her. I say fuck off.
@EU_Commission Still waiting for the (EU) standard for usb-c charging from 2009 to become true … was written september 2021 … #circulair #dontwasteourplanet #weallbecomeone

@EU_Commission This is a solution looking for a problem. I have no problem with chargers or cords. Only 1 change has taken place on my iphones since my first 14 years ago & it was in the pursuit of innovation & advancement. If this law impacted me, I’d throw away and need to replace 5 chargers!
@EU_Commission Thanks for pushing Apple to do better. Interoperability is freedom.
@EU_Commission @EUHomeAffairs @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Common Technology standards are a good idea as long as it doesn’t thwart innovation

@EU_Commission Since 94 I have had 7 different cables to charge my phones. Granted 4 were by 2010 but in 15 I spent like $200 on QC adapters while on Android heck last year I went to iPhone and have only bought that MagSafe charger cable just cause. Granted my @Bose speakers use microb in 21 :(

@EU_Commission Russia, China, former Yugoslavians, Korea, Vietnam, Ethiopia, Syria, Libya, Iraq, Iran, India, Brazil, ... shall make economic & military union to challenge US America & its puppet UN. Also have to let US pay compensation for all damages occured by US & its allies.
@EU_Commission Lol by the time this shit is fully enacted, there will be USB D and 10M range xiaomi wireless charging
@EU_Commission Thanks EU!
@EU_Commission fantastic stuff.
@EU_Commission USB-C and it’s lack of real Standard is such a big problem already. At least Lightning is firm and stable
@EU_Commission Great

@EU_Commission you boomers are stuck in 2008 with these new regulations. Most phone chargers are USB-C these days, including iPhone’s 🤦‍♂️ 

And once again, making rules just to make them and for “feel good” news. Dumb.
@EU_Commission Thank you !!!
@EU_Commission And where would we be today, if you mandated USB-A when it was the standard? What is the path for dumping USB-C when a better connectors are invented? 🤷‍♂️ overregulating much eh?
@EU_Commission Now do common batteries with differing grades of battery life and/or size. Premium to standard.
@EU_Commission support for this. But how to allow innovation in 10y for a better port ?
@EU_Commission Here is a simple and reasonable regulation that should make a difference.

@EU_Commission This would make sense if chargers were still inseparable from the cables. I receive one cable with a new device, seems fine, since the cable will eventually break. This is just another legislation that would have made sense 15 years ago.
@EU_Commission When this was proposed a while back wasn't apple's response no thanks
@EU_Commission No. Bugger off.
@EU_Commission @WHO What about second hand smoke? Too many people forced to be passive smoker, everywhere, any time.
@EU_Commission Considering that modern smartphones have the same attack to charge battery
@EU_Commission Looking forward to it ....

@EU_Commission Very few chargers still come with the cable attached, so what you are proposing really only affects the cables, which actually are interchangeable with the charger heads. Many cables even have in-built adapters, so they can do both Lighting & USB-C

@EU_Commission 
En España el Partido Popular propone en el Parlamento reformar el Poder Judicial para que sea independiente de los políticos
El gobierno de Sánchez, su partido el PSOE, sus socios comunistas independentistas, han votado en contra
Están contra el estado de derecho
@EU_Commission A m e n!
@EU_Commission Actually same goes for wired earphones. I found out that @Huawei might only work on some USB-C devices and not all. Or not all earphones might work on Huawei or other brands.

@EU_Commission no, they are not, im good thanks, this would be worst as people would be forced (or more wanting) to replace other devices like speaker docs etc a few 10000 speakers Vs leads? that would be more Electronic Waste than ever with many lightening products already in homes.
@EU_Commission Nope. No chargers in my drawer.

@EU_Commission That’s amazing. Have three kids with iPad/iPhone and I have to buy crappy lightning cables every few months because they are all breaking. That’s apples business model as they know you will have to continually buy cables. $$$$$$

@EU_Commission Beautiful. I’m American, but I’m glad to see usb-c become a standard. I cleaned out my drawers the other day and had over 15 usb-a chargers I never use anymore most of which only slow charge. My usb-c usb-pd chargers are much more versatile.
@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Go feed those homeless sleeping next to your EU big buildings first.. don’t worry about our devices
@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Yet still wrapped in plastic. Why can’t consumers change their own battery? #RightToRepair
@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Isn’t usb-pd already a major standard?
@EU_Commission Great idea!

@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU Optional charger is good if you already have a suitable one. If you don't, it's just more money you have to spend, I would keep that in mind.
@EU_Commission USB-C above all.
@EU_Commission Europe is not Great Britain, Europe is not a nation, Europe is not homogeneous, speak our language please !
@EU_Commission watching the EU is watching a turtle participating in a rabbit race..

@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU It's about time to put an end to "European Commission". This cancerous unaccountable institution is sticking its dirty hands into everything.
@EU_Commission no. I have a major brand not being Apple so no issues there.
@EU_Commission @ThierryBreton @EU_Growth @DigitalEU @GospodinovaEU @OplOutarde unroll
@EU_Commission Amazing idea !
@EU_Commission @WHO #NeXit
@EU_Commission Nice talk strategy and nothing happend
